entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0081.9278] The line item concept us-gaap:ResearchAndDevelopmentAssetAcquiredOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationWrittenOff with a value of 75,000 and a calculation parent of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses is represented as a sibling of us-gaap:ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense in the extension taxonomy role 1003004 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME, but us-gaap:ResearchAndDevelopmentAssetAcquiredOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationWrittenOff is represented as a descendent of us-gaap:ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense in the us-gaap taxonomies. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for these two line item concepts.
The properties of this us-gaap:ResearchAndDevelopmentAssetAcquiredOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationWrittenOff fact are:
Period :2018-07-01 to 2018-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/856982/000085698218000078/mmsi-20180930.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Research and Development Asset Acquired Other than Through Business Combination, Written-off

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0015.7162] us-gaap:BusinessCombinationBargainPurchaseGainRecognizedAmount has a value of -778,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:BusinessCombinationBargainPurchaseGainRecognizedAmount fact are: Period :2017-07-01 to 2017-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/856982/000085698218000078/mmsi-20180930.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Business Combination, Bargain Purchase, Gain Recognized, Amount
